subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{l|ja|癈疾|tr=[[はいしつ]], ''[[haishitsu]]''}}: a [[disease]] with no [[recovery]], a [[disability]]; a [[disabled]] person
* {{l|ja|癈人|tr=[[はいじん]], ''[[haijin]]''}}: a [[disabled]] person, a [[cripple]]
* {{l|ja|癈兵|tr=[[はいへい]], ''[[haihei]]''}}: a [[crippled]] [[soldier]], no longer able to [[fight]]
* {{l|ja|癈目|tr=[[しいれめ]], ''[[shiireme]]''}}: [[blind]] [[eye]]s
* {{l|ja|癈老|tr=[[はいろう]], ''[[hairō]]''}}: [[disability]] and [[senility]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: The stem or continuative form ({{l|ja|連用形|tr=''ren'yōkei''}}) of the verb {{m|ja|癈う|tr=shiu||to lose a sense, to become numb; to lose function in a bodily organ}}.

subSections.title: Noun
